text: “Judaba ko, Jerusalemia arazir kurar kabagh amima, Ikiavɨra Itir God men anɨngaghegha me gasɨghasɨki. An apaniba amadazɨ me iza, en inazir afeziabav soghezɨ me ariaghire. Egha me en amuiba ko, otariba ko, guiviba inigha ghua kalabuziabar mɨn uan kantrin ghue. Ezɨ ikɨzir igharazibar gumazamiziba, Ikiavɨra Itir God, en nguibar ekiabagh amizir biziba baregha, me dɨgavir kuram gamua, bar atiatigha dɨbovir akabar e gami. Ezɨ e bizir kaba bar adagh fo.
